function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Potential omission of important research and information needed for disease mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Use multiple databases and search strategies to ensure comprehensive coverage of relevant articles","Technologies":"Advanced search algorithms, machine learning for article selection","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Incomplete or inaccurate search queries may result in irrelevant or biased results","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data, leading to flawed strategies for disease mitigation","Mitigation":"Careful formulation and validation of search queries, peer review of search methodology","Technologies":"Natural language processing, query validation tools","People":"Research analysts, database administrators","Owner":"Research institutions, academic publishers"},{"Description":"Limited coverage of historical literature may result in incomplete understanding of pandemic trends and strategies","Impact":"Missed insights from past pandemics, leading to ineffective strategies for current pandemic management","Mitigation":"Inclusion of historical literature in search queries, collaboration with historians and epidemiologists","Technologies":"Data mining, historical document digitization","People":"Historians, epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, historical societies"}]}
